card.name: Academy Raider
card.text: Intimidate Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Accorder's Shield
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. Equip {3}

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Advocate of the Beast
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.

card.name: Air Servant
card.text: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

card.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
card.text: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. -3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn. -8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

card.name: Ajani's Chosen
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.

card.name: Altar's Reap
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

card.name: Angelic Accord
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Archangel of Thune
card.text: Flying Lifelink Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Artificer's Hex
card.text: Enchant Equipment At the beginning of your upkeep, if enchanted Equipment is attached to a creature, destroy that creature.

card.name: Auramancer
card.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Awaken the Ancient
card.text: Enchant Mountain Enchanted Mountain is a 7/7 red Giant creature with haste. It's still a land.

card.name: Banisher Priest
card.text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Barrage of Expendables
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Battle Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature {W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Blightcaster
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Bairn
card.text: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Blur Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Bogbrew Witch
card.text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Bonescythe Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have double strike.

card.name: Bramblecrush
card.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Brave the Elements
card.text: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Briarpack Alpha
card.text: Flash When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Brindle Boar
card.text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.

card.name: Bubbling Cauldron
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Burning Earth
card.text: Whenever a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, Burning Earth deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Capashen Knight
card.text: First strike {1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Celestial Flare
card.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
card.text: +1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn. 0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. -7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Chandra's Phoenix
card.text: Flying Haste Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Charging Griffin
card.text: Flying Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.text: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Clone
card.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Colossal Whale
card.text: Islandwalk Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Congregate
card.text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Corpse Hauler
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Corrupt
card.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Cyclops Tyrant
card.text: Intimidate Cyclops Tyrant can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Dark Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

card.name: Dark Prophecy
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Darksteel Forge
card.text: Artifacts you control have indestructible.

card.name: Darksteel Ingot
card.text: Indestructible {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Demolish
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

card.name: Devout Invocation
card.text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Dismiss into Dream
card.text: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Disperse
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Divine Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

card.name: Domestication
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Door of Destinies
card.text: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

card.name: Dragon Egg
card.text: Defender When Dragon Egg dies, put a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Dragon Hatchling
card.text: Flying {R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Duress
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Elite Arcanist
card.text: When Elite Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. X is the converted mana cost of the exiled card.

card.name: Elixir of Immortality
card.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

card.name: Elvish Mystic
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Encroaching Wastes
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Enlarge
card.text: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Essence Scatter
card.text: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Festering Newt
card.text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.

card.name: Fiendslayer Paladin
card.text: First strike Lifelink Fiendslayer Paladin can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.

card.name: Fireshrieker
card.text: Equipped creature has double strike. Equip {2}

card.name: Flames of the Firebrand
card.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Fleshpulper Giant
card.text: When Fleshpulper Giant enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with toughness 2 or less.

card.name: Fog
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Fortify
card.text: Choose one - Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn; or creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Frost Breath
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Galerider Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have flying.

card.name: Garruk, Caller of Beasts
card.text: +1: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. -3: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. -7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library."

card.name: Garruk's Horde
card.text: Trample Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Glimpse the Future
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.text: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Goblin Shortcutter
card.text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

card.text: Choose target creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

card.text: Sliver creatures you control have trample.

card.text: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Indestructibility
card.text: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent has indestructible.

card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Jace, Memory Adept
card.text: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. 0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. -7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

card.name: Jace's Mindseeker
card.text: Flying When Jace's Mindseeker enters the battlefield, target opponent puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost.

card.text: Trample Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

card.text: +1: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. -3: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control. -6: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have '''{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.'"

card.text: Whenever Master of Diversion attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.text: Sliver creatures you control get +3/+3.

card.name: Mindsparker
card.text: First strike Whenever an opponent casts a white or blue instant or sorcery spell, Mindsparker deals 2 damage to that player.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Path of Bravery

card.text: Sliver creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Primeval Bounty
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Pyromancer's Gauntlet
card.text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control or a red planeswalker you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Quag Sickness
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.

card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Ratchet Bomb

card.name: Ring of Three Wishes
card.text: Ring of Three Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {5}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Ring of Three Wishes: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sanguine Bond
card.text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Savage Summoning
card.text: Savage Summoning can't be countered. The next creature card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. That spell can't be countered. That creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Scavenging Ooze

card.text: Whenever you cast a red spell or a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a 1/1 red Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Zephyr Charge
card.text: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
